game.name: Dangerous Circle
game.description:
If you love trying out new arcade games online on your mobile phone, desktop and laptop computer, tablet, iPad or iPhone, Dangerous Circle is just for you. The only way to guide you towards the victory is to keep your character running without touching any obstacles. Do you think that you can dare to sort out this puzzle right away? Join our brand new arcade challenge and prove the world that you have enough skills to face off any obstacles!

Your objective in this cool html5 skill game is to help your character orbit around the circle while avoiding the obstacles that you see on its way. These obstacles can be in the form of spikes that you see appearing both inside and outside of the circle time to time. You have to change the direction of your character to avoid the crash. Try to be very fast to change where little ball orbits to dodge the obstacles! You will get 1 point if the little ball completes its rotation around the circle. 

Do not forget to collect as many gems as you can to allow yourself to unlock new funny and exciting characters to make your gameplay more interesting. Remember the speed of the game will increase with the time to make this cool skill based boys game more challenging. Check out more addictive and awesome free kids games on your computers, mobile phones and tablets by browsing through our huge category of online games on atmegame.com!
